ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards in Sebilis
ygData.msgSnippet: I generally like to move around a lot as well.  Fighting in the same zone for an extended period of time bores me.  However, I have been trying to get a
ygData.messageBody:
I generally like to move around a lot as well. Fighting in the same zone
for an extended period of time bores me. However, I have been trying to get
a Harmonic Dagger and/or Partisan from Karnors to upgrade my weapons.
Currently I am using a Journeyman Walking Stick and Martune Rapier. The JWS
is a good weapon for bards since it procs Tashani. I need to upgrade the
Martune Rapier though. There are a lot of other zones I can get EXP in, but
at least in Karnors I can get good EXP plus a chance at getting one of the
two weapons. With that said, I am about to give up on actually ever looting
a Partisan or Harmonic Dagger. I've killed the caller of Sathir so many
times I have lost count. He has dropped the kunzar cloak every time. Have
never been able to get into a hand/jail group to camp the drolvarg warlord
for the HD. So I'm thinking, for a change of pace, to instead head to
Sebilis and hopefully get some Singing Steel pieces instead of upgrading my
weapons. However, if Sebilis at 51 is over my head, then I will stick to
Karnors.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 11:06 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards in Sebilis


I move around a lot - and spent a lot of time in Karnor and Skyfire to get
experience. Also - Raptors in Timourous Deep - while giving next to loot at
all (runes and words is alls) give great experience.

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 1:31 PM
To: EQBards
Subject: [eqbards] Bards in Sebilis

I've never been to Sebilis and was thinking of making that my main hangout
for a while once I get to 51st level. For those of you with a lot of
experience hunting in that zone, would like your feedback. Since all of the
mobs there will be 45+, I assume Pixie Strike will not be that effective.
Not certain how well Charm will work. I know once I get to 53 and get SoT
then crowd control will be a lot easier. But until then, how effective will
I be at performing crowd control in Sebilis? Would it be smarter to hang
out in Karnors and other zones until I get to 53 and head to Sebilis then?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci
